Subskills.name: Interstellar Traveller
Subskills.description: Increases the speed of solar dash.

Subskills.name: Bursting Flames
Subskills.description: Flames now have a chance to explode into multiple fire balls into all directions when expiring.

Subskills.name: Solar Burst
Subskills.description: Unleash a fiery explosion at the end dealing increased damage and inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Restoring Flames
Subskills.description: Gain increased life and mana replenish on cast for a short duration when solar form is active.

Subskills.name: Cooldown Lap
Subskills.description: Decreases the speed of solar dash.

Subskills.name: Plasma Dash
Subskills.description: Chance to stun targets on hit.

Subskills.name: To Ashes
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by solar dash.

Subskills.name: Photon Dash
Subskills.description: Dash with the speed of light unleashing burning flames below target on collision dealing increased damage over time.

Subskills.name: Protective Cover
Subskills.description: Gain increased damage reduction for a short duration when using solar dash.

Subskills.name: Intense Flames
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of solar dash flames.

Subskills.name: Shooting Star
Subskills.description: Increases the speed of solar dash unleashing fireballs around you at the end dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Solar Carnage
Subskills.description: Rapidly unleash fire balls arcing on your sides while dashing.

Subskills.name: The Sun Goddess
Subskills.description: Summon multiple orbiting solar orbs decreasing your dashing speed.
